bullets: Ingests 12 operational data domains
5 intelligence layers: Performance Report, Pulse, Benchmark, Watchtower, Insights

hero.headline: Decision Intelligence for Restaurants
hero.subheadline: Turn fragmented operational signals into daily actions through real-time Pulse, benchmarking, and automated insights.

modules.name: Benchmark

bullets: Natural language query interface with three-panel layout
NL-to-SQL conversion and execution
Structured visual responses (KPI cards, charts, analysis cards, tables, HTML reports)

modules.blurb: 10 deep analytics modules across every operational domain.
modules.name: Insights

modules.blurb: Historical analytics foundation. Six report tabs covering full sales performance: Overview, Revenue Mix, Category Performance, Tender Mix, Daypart Analysis, Guest Counting.
bullets: 6 report tabs (Overview, Revenue Mix, Category Performance, Tender Mix, Daypart Analysis, Guest Counting)
Interactive charts (area, bar, pie, line, radial bar)
Multi-restaurant selector with segment filtering
Date range comparison (vs. last year, last month, custom)
Monthly target setting with proration
modules.name: Performance Report

modules.blurb: Real-time operations command center with 17 sub-pages.
bullets: Hero pace bar with adaptive AI targets and hourly breakdown
Active staff tracking with SPLH and break compliance
Bottleneck detection across KITCHEN/HOST/POS zones
Void/refund/discount/comp anomaly detection with per-employee patterns
86'd items, critical low, prep shortage, velocity tracking
modules.name: Pulse

modules.blurb: External market and competitive intelligence engine with 4 sections.
bullets: AI-generated morning briefing with context KPI strip (weather/events/revenue)
Prioritized action items and unified signal feed
Google Places competitor discovery with configurable radius
Competitor tracking with ratings history and review themes
Sentiment landscape analysis and alert feed
